title: Shop wont work
body:
the store in the launcher wont work for me, i cant buy any runes or champions even though i have 7k ip

i click on the unlock button but nothing happens

replies.body: i logged into my account on another computer and it worked, however it still doesn't work on MY computer, im considering trying the launcher repair option, but since its happening to other people i dont know if that will work
I'm having the same issue too. the unlock button does nothing!
